Title: Grandshot 2
Description: Grandshot 2 is an awesome 2D shooter with a great ragdoll and animation system, vehicles and lots of blood and gore. Written in VB.Net
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Grandshot 2 is an awesome 2D shooter with a great ragdoll and animation system, vehicles and lots of blood and gore. Written in VB.Net

ARTISTS WANTED!!  Please join us if you want to design levels and weapons for this and other upcoming games. Anyone who want to help is welcome!!

Official blog: http://rafatonic.blogspot.mx/

How to play
WASD
X for vehicles and grabbing weapons
Space for reload
Shift for slow time

 

How to extend/modify Grandshot 2
Check the Grandshot 2 arquitecture page
